availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles H. Buckman (Union County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of C. J. Buckman and Caroline Buckman. Farmer in Union County in 1860. Married Martha Quiggins Buckman in Hardin County on October 21, 1856. Father of Charles Buckman, Louisa Buckman, Francis Buckman, and Mary Buckman. Farmer in Union County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, p. 359.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Missouri, Buchanan County, St. Joseph Ward 4, p. 574A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Hardin County Marriages, Film #000390788, p. 383.
